name: prodeq12i
params: setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3
body: |- wceq(cprod(s0, c0, c1), cprod(s0, c2, c3))
bodyPretty: ⊢ prod(s0 ∈ c0, c1)= prod(s0 ∈ c2, c3)

stmt.origin: eqtri(cprod(s0, c0, c1), cprod(s0, c2, c3), cprod(s0, c0, c3))
stmt.pretty: eqtri(prod(s0 ∈ c0, c1), prod(s0 ∈ c2, c3), prod(s0 ∈ c0, c3))

body.origin:
|- wceq(cprod(s0, c0, c1), cprod(s0, c2, c3))
-| wceq(cprod(s0, c0, c1), cprod(s0, c0, c3))
-| wceq(cprod(s0, c0, c3), cprod(s0, c2, c3))
body.pretty:
⊢ prod(s0 ∈ c0, c1)= prod(s0 ∈ c2, c3)
⊣ prod(s0 ∈ c0, c1)= prod(s0 ∈ c0, c3)
⊣ prod(s0 ∈ c0, c3)= prod(s0 ∈ c2, c3)

cumulated.origin:
|- wceq(cprod(s0, c0, c1), cprod(s0, c2, c3))
-| wceq(cprod(s0, c0, c1), cprod(s0, c0, c3))
-| wceq(cprod(s0, c0, c3), cprod(s0, c2, c3))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ prod(s0 ∈ c0, c1)= prod(s0 ∈ c2, c3)
⊣ prod(s0 ∈ c0, c1)= prod(s0 ∈ c0, c3)
⊣ prod(s0 ∈ c0, c3)= prod(s0 ∈ c2, c3)

body.origin:
|- wceq(cprod(s0, c0, c1), cprod(s0, c0, c3))
-| wi(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wceq(c1, c3))
-| diffsc(s0, c0)

cumulated.origin:
|- wceq(cprod(s0, c0, c1), cprod(s0, c2, c3))
-| wceq(cprod(s0, c0, c3), cprod(s0, c2, c3))
-| wi(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wceq(c1, c3))
-| diffsc(s0, c0)
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ prod(s0 ∈ c0, c1)= prod(s0 ∈ c2, c3)
⊣ prod(s0 ∈ c0, c3)= prod(s0 ∈ c2, c3)
⊣ (s0 ∈ c0 → c1 = c3)
⊣ d(s0, c0)

body.origin:
|- wceq(cprod(s0, c0, c3), cprod(s0, c2, c3))
-| wceq(c0, c2)
-| diffsc(s0, c0)
-| diffsc(s0, c2)
body.pretty:
⊢ prod(s0 ∈ c0, c3)= prod(s0 ∈ c2, c3)
⊣ c0 = c2
⊣ d(s0, c0)
⊣ d(s0, c2)

cumulated.origin:
|- wceq(cprod(s0, c0, c1), cprod(s0, c2, c3))
